extendedInfo.description: Today's food is full of additives. Are they dangerous?Our app helps you find the answer. Try it, it's free!This app is the perfect tool while food shopping. In a second, you can find out if they are safe for you and your family or if they are suspicious or dangerous. It also lets you know if they are suitable for vegetarians, vegans or different religious groups.So here they are: preservatives and sweeteners, food colorings or taste enhancers, unveiled!The app shows the ingredients' legal status in Australia and New Zealand, Europa and the United States. It allows you to quickly check on more than 500 ingredients. You can search them by E-code, by name or by alternative names.Internet connection is NOT required to use the app.Features:- You can search for food additives by E-number, by name or by alternative name(s).- Fast E-CODE Computer for easy and fast search just in codes.- Personal rating system, if you want to put different risk in additives.- Customized details page, you can add/remove 15 elements from details page.- You can read the details on any additive with just one tap.- You can filter additives based on text queries.- The lists can be sorted by names or by E numbers.- You can share a details page.- It's also possible to filter additives based on risks.- A new favorites list can be managed by user.- The history list retains the last additives that you searched.- You can zoom in/out the description field in details page.- There is a âshortcutâ button in the list and details pages title for easy search.Extra:- It allows you to check whether an additive is suitable for vegans, vegetarians, children, pregnant women, people with asthma or allergic reactions, or for people from different religions.- You can update the app anytime if you have an internet connection.- On our information on additives page, you can leave comments with references, which will be taken into account in the future versions of the additive database.- It allows integration with Google search widget.- Zoom in the description field in details page can be done by scale gesture.- Highlight description words.Visit our site and leave us your comments, they can help us improve the app.Facts:"Some additives have been used for centuries; for example, preserving food by pickling (with vinegar), salting, as with bacon, preserving sweets or using sulfur dioxide as in some wines. With the advent of processed foods in the second half of the 20th century, many more additives have been introduced, of both natural and artificial origin."[wikipedia]Some of them are harmless, many not quite healthy and several are dangerous.There is some controversy about adverse reactions to food additives, particularly in relation to their effects on children. Many people have experienced various negative reactions to food additives. Certain groups may be more susceptible to adverse effects, such as asthma sufferers, chemically sensitive and allergic individuals or hyperactive children.Keywords: E-numbers, E-Codes, Food Additives, Food, Diet, Health, Additives, E Numbers, E Codes.

reviews.title: User friendly and helpful
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this app for a while now and I find it very easy to use and helpful to keep track of my baby\'s day. Thanks!
reviews.author: Nadia Farcas

reviews.title: Excellent information
reviews.comment: This app is excellent. The info is thorough. I use it when I shop. The app is excellent and healthy. I recommend highly.
reviews.author: Njeri Yusuf

reviews.title: Love it! :)
reviews.comment: This app is so convenient! I highly recommend this for vegans. There are a few things here and there that aren\'t listed but really I\'ve only not gotten a result two or three times and I use this app at LEAST 10x a day. I absolutely love it! :)
reviews.author: Destiney O\'Dell

reviews.title: great
reviews.comment: please update data from EU regulation such as name of food additive , daily intake

reviews.title: Wow!
reviews.comment: Very informative and easy to use. My only suggestion would be to add the option to sort by risk level. :-)
reviews.author: M Noriega

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Simply amazing.  Fast and amazing search. Very very very helpful. We are waiting for language support now! Would be happy to pay for app with languages.

reviews.comment: I love it. It has helped me deal with my child\'s intolerance so much. I even recommended it to a nutritionist

reviews.title: Brilliant ap
reviews.comment: I use this constantly it gives very good information and is easy to use.  Never crashes and the links work very well, ads are minimal.

reviews.title: Rebecca
reviews.comment: I always knew if you can not pronounce it. It must not be meant for the human body. This application provides us with exactly it is we are putting in our bodies. It\'s a crying shame our government allows us to be Literally poisoned by these man made chemicals. Read this app. & you will know how to be a healthy person dispite our government trying to kill us off...
reviews.author: Rebecca Gagnon

reviews.title: AMAZING AND USEFUL
reviews.comment: This app is very impressive.  But since it doesn\'t always show \"alternate\" spellings, be aware that some items may SEEM to not be on the list.  Look for Calcium Sulfate, an ingredient in Sara Lee Classic White bread -- and you won\'t find anything.But run a search for Calcium SULPHATE, and you\'ll find it.  Aside from that, I love this app.
reviews.author: Dan Sterling

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: This is an excellent app, I find it extremely useful whilst shopping. Food Labels can be quite confusing, even on healthy products but having this app makes it a much easier and a less stressful experience! A bonus in my book! Highly recommend.
reviews.author: Mama Lion

reviews.title: Very Helpful
reviews.comment: This app is a must have, for the label readers who care about what is in their food. Thank you
reviews.author: Mishka MyAnimal

reviews.title: 7Steve7
reviews.comment: A lot of Work went into this app. Good work. Very handy for the health conscious. Works well. Great that you can use it off line. Thank you.
reviews.author: Steve Georgiou
